name: Spherez
description:
AD to move Red, W to jump

Left Right arrows to move Blue, Up arrow to jump

Don't touch grey-white blocks

Don't fall off the edge

You can touch ramps and green blocks

Get to the end of the level!

Includes:

  • Split Screen Movement
  • 3 Original Levels
  • Cool Lighting
  • Ramps and colliding blocks
  • Particle Effects!
